subject: Guillain-Barre Syndrome
lead_paragraph: The Bundesliga club, built on youth and players cast off by wealthier clubs, is led by a coach, Markus Babbel, whose soccer playing career was cut short by Guillain-Barré Syndrome.
snippet: The Bundesliga club, built on youth and players cast off by wealthier clubs, is led by a coach, Markus Babbel, whose soccer playing career was cut short by Guillain-Barré Syndrome.
